desc: The Tooth Fairy Gold Coin set is beautifully minted from metal alloys reflecting a magical golden shimmer with a color soft enamel Tooth Fairy design and special embossed message. 25 mm wide and 2 mm deep. The complete set of 10 coins is housed in a forest green felt tie bag, A wonderful gift and timeless keepsake.

layout.text: Watch your children wake with joy and happiness with a special gift from the Tooth Fairy. This uniquely designed 10 coin set glistens with gold and color with a special message to make your child feel fairy happy.
